Introduction
This topic contains information about IMOs, including
definition of an IMO
who may initiate a request for an IMO
submitting a request for an IMO
, and
processing requests for an IMO
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Examinations in Special Situations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
